verses.name: John 11:11
verses.text: These things said he: and after that he saith unto them, Our friend Lazarus sleepeth; but I go, that I may awake him out of sleep.

verses.name: John 11:12
verses.text: Then said his disciples, Lord, if he sleep, he shall do well.

verses.name: John 11:13
verses.text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death: but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep.

verses.name: John 11:14
verses.text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly, Lazarus is dead.

verses.name: John 11:15
verses.text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there, to the intent ye may believe; nevertheless let us go unto him.
